name: Hilton Garden Inn Sarasota - Bradenton Airport

reviews.text: Our son was getting married in Sarasota at the Charles Ringling House and we wanted a place where family and friends could have a nice place and be all in one place for a wedding weekend...HGI's reputation was confirmed with this hotel and it met all of our Hilton Honors expectations.....We were there over several days and there were probably 30 of us over that time. We felt like it was our own getaway.
reviews.title: Best place for wedding guests, large group

reviews.text: The property's grerat sense of arrival with the huge green lawn was a welcoming sign. Spaious rooms, lots of nice public spaces, great breakfast option, fitness center, and a business center plus a hotel shuttle service downtwon and back no charge. And a special room rate as well.
reviews.title: Awesome service hotel

reviews.text: We were able to join tables for the breakfasts and in the late evening, the young people were able to sit around in the lobby and share....It was a wonderful experience. We made all the arrangmentes long distance through the sales coordiantor and while we did not do the reception or the rehearsal dinner there, we certainly could have, David Alexander was most accommodating in arranging it as a guest sales and helping us get a shuttle service as well as providing the hotel shuttle for our guests to the wedding about a mile away as well. Our guests also got around downtown and its eateries and shopping quite well with the hotel shuttle, too.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel

reviews.text: We thought we were in our own hometown. We did all of this long distance so we had to have a lot of trust in the HGI brand. Big thank yous to David and to Linda Brooke for their leadership..
reviews.title: Clean room and nice work out facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very friendly staff, clean rooms, good restaurant and bar service. Convenient to airport.
reviews.title: Great stop-over hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we went one night at sarasota at this hotel and it very a nice place to stay. no too expensive for a hilton and the personnal on the front dest are very sympathetic with us. we visited the mote aquarium and siesta key beach and both is close from the hotel. the room was very spacious and the bed was very confortable. We plan to going back in the futur in this area of florida and it's pretty sure that i will reserve again at this great hotel!
reviews.title: great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time at this hotel. We stayed for 3 nights in July 2010. The front desk staff were top notch and very helpful. Every staff member we met were eager to help and always pleasant. The rooms are very clean and have nice decor and the beds were super comfortable.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel, Fantastic Location

reviews.text: The only down side is the continental breakfast is not free. You have to pay $2 per item (juice, toast, muffin, etc.) Coffee is free. If it weren't for that, our stay would've been perfect and flawless.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel...a few minor complaints

reviews.text: The pool and hot tub were always clean and nice to cool off in. We used it everyday!
reviews.title: The staff is there best asset

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is seconds from the airport and the shuttle was great. We also made use of the free shuttle to anywhere within 5 miles of the hotel. They took us to dinner and picked us up again! Fantastic!
reviews.title: Great hotel for both business and leisure guests

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The price was right at this great place to stay. Our first floor room was surprisingly quiet the first night since a wedding reception was going on right down the hall. The staff, especially Chris, the bartender who served us a late night dinner were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was not free but reasonable as you could have it cooked to order.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

reviews.text: One of the best things was the extremely tidy self-laundry which we made use of and was the only available one on our entire two week journey through 8 hotels. Wi-fi was free and fast and we had easy access to our car (free parking).
reviews.title: My Second Favorite HGI in the USA (Ponte Vedra, #1)

reviews.text: This hotel is less than five minutes from the Ringling Museum and Estate. Don't miss it and also the Classic Car Museum across the road. A drive to St. Armands (15 min.) for dinner is also a good idea.
reviews.title: Comfy , thoughtful staff, immaculate

reviews.text: Of course, I rarely stay at HGIs, but when I am in Sarasota (frequently, on business) this is where I stay. I have tried every hotel in Sarasota-Bradenton over the last several years, and this one is #1 in town. Including the R***-C******, which is ostentatious for my tastes.
reviews.title: Very friendly staff does not make-up for poor mgmt and noisy location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pros: Excellent location, the "Pure" room with it's air filter unit provided my desired white noise for sleeping, and the internet connection worked perfectly. Great lobby for pre-meeting meetings, breakfast was also good (chef - 10 points, waitress, 2 points); Outstanding front desk service makes this my second favorite HGI.
reviews.title: They treat you like family here.

reviews.text: We booked this hotel to spend Christmas eve with our family in beautiful Sarasota. At first, I was apprehensive because the hotel did not look great in the website photos, but the rooms were nice when we got there! The lobby was cozy, the staff was friendly and the rooms were very clean.
reviews.title: Not sure the website does the actual hotel justice because it exceeded my expectations!

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night for business.
reviews.title: Good Business Hotel in Sarasota

reviews.text: Hilton Garden Inn is a good business hotel. I guess it is also good for vacation, since there were a lot of tourists.
reviews.title: A Few Too Many Thorns for a Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.text: Room was a little smaller than I am used to, but still big enough to feel comfortable.
reviews.title: Most comfortable bed I ever slept in, but had the most uncomfortable night's sleep!

reviews.text: It was clean and the bed was comfortable.
reviews.title: Slept Wonderfully!

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Sarasota - Bradenton Airport Hotel
